name: Crystal Cove
description:
Proof of concept single-player, 3D, third-person, point-and-click, maze, puzzle game.

Set on the distant Crystalline Beaches of the Micro-planet Star Sword.  This Sci-Fi, Fantasy is designed to be a template to create an expandable universe.

A Brave Young Prince navigates a series of dangerous mazes as a coming of age ceremony to prove his right to ascend to the Throne!
